column5: Private room in our modern home located in a tranquil neighborhood in south Austin. Our backyard backs up to a large wooded park. Enjoy the patio while gazing at the large oak trees. Our game room includes a pool table you are welcome to use. Nearby is a playground, hiking trails and creek. Close proximity to shopping (South Park Meadows), restaurants, and freeways for easy access to downtown, Zilker Park, Barton Springs, & South Congress shops & night life. Bus stop 0.5 mile walk.
